survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Green Energy Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with workplace green energy initiatives, including solar panels, energy-efficient lighting, and other sustainability efforts.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's current green energy initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's current green energy initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following green energy initiatives has your company implemented? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture the range of initiatives in place.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox for multi-choice selection.

script.question_text: Which of the following green energy initiatives has your company implemented? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How impactful do you find the company's green energy initiatives in reducing your carbon footprint?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure perceived impact.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How impactful do you find the company's green energy initiatives in reducing your carbon footprint?

questions.question_text: What additional green energy initiatives would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text for free-form responses.

script.question_text: What additional green energy initiatives would you like to see implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Do you believe the company communicates its green energy initiatives effectively to employees?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to assess communication effectiveness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Do you believe the company communicates its green energy initiatives effectively to employees?
